page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: INDUSTRY- Although Worcester is the County Town of a Shire county there is varied industry in this block much of it known world-wide. LEA and PERRINS founded in 1823 make the famous spicy sauce,first sold in 1837 and has been exported since 1840. METAL BOX makes tin plate which is used to manufacture cans or tins in which many types of food, meat, vegetables and fruit,and drink, can be preserved. Most famous of Worcester firms must be WORCESTER PORCELAIN manufacturers of fine china for over two centuries. The firm was founded by Dr. John Wall in 1751 and the exquisite pocelain figures are collectors items throughout the world. Another industry equally as famous in its day were the Worcester Gloves, but changes in fashions during the 1920s when gloves were not worn put this industry and its firms into decline.
